Header Section with Navigation and Call-.Layout: Top-aligned header with logo on the left and navigation links centered, accompanied by call-to-action buttons on the right.
Header Section with Navigation and Call-.Design: Clean, organized, and balanced. Featuring a prominent logo, straightforward navigation menu, and call-to-action buttons for contact and menu.

Key Elements.Navigation Menu: Centered with links to home, features, pricing, and about pages, becomes hidden on smaller screens.
